description: Add a touch of elegance to your steak by wrapping it in D'Orsogna bacon and serving it alongside a beetroot-and-feta salad.
name: Easy Bacon-Wrapped Steak With Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600 g Woolworths beef oyster blade steak
270 g Woolworths creamy & crunchy salad kit

recipeInstructions.text: Divide salad amongst plates and top with cheese. Add steak to plates. Serve.
